title: WebTikz
text: This is a website on using Tikz extension with Quarto. The following topics are covered:

title: WebTikz
text:
1 Adding Tikz extension

install danmackinlay extension on project folder. Run the code below using Terminal.
quarto add danmackinlay/quarto_tikz
this will install the extension under the _extensions subdirectory. Check using directory command ls.
include in yaml
filters: 
  - tikz
create a code block with class .tikz
```tikz
